title: Mercury Transit in the 10th House for Sagittarius Ascendant
summary: When Mercury transits the 10th house for Sagittarius Ascendant, communication, planning, and decision-making strongly influence career and public image. Professional discussions, meetings, and presentations increase, and your ideas gain visibility with seniors and authority figures. This is a productive phase for strategy, management, and goal-oriented communication. However, overthinking or inconsistent messaging can weaken authority. When used with clarity and discipline, this transit supports reputation building, intellectual leadership, and steady professional advancement.

sections.title: Finance
points: Income linked to ideas and skills

closing: This Mercury transit sharpens professional communication. With discipline, it supports reputation growth, leadership thinking, and career progress.
